title: Pelakhar
text: Interrupt: Spend 11 food and 3 mana. Discard a foe from a mission staging area.

title: Gossamer Veil
text: At the beginning of a season, may play Gossamer Veil on a character. For the remainder of the season, all disguise tests made by that character are easy.

title: Aren's Forge
text: A player may start the season with Aren's Forge in their hand. Play Card: Spend 4 ore to lower difficulty of command test by two or add +1 to the conquest track.

title: Thedda's Palimpsest
text: At the beginning of a season, may play Thedda's Palimpsest on a character. That character ignores all backlash from mana spends.

title: Sapphire Djinn
text: At the beginning of a season, may play Sapphire Djinn on a character. The difficulty of all rapport and command tests made by the character are lowered by two. After the season is over, the character must take one psyche condition.

title: Firstborn Peak
text: Something to stop the Autarch. Maybe connected to the Animaelic Forest?

title: The Dawncaves
text: A powerful book of magic? Turn 35 mana into a skill increase? Teleport characters between missions? Maybe can play to search through the asset deck and grab any one card? That's super handy.
